document_data.name: ''Amulet of True Strikes''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''amulet of true strikes''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[amulet]] worn by [[ranger]]s around [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The wearer of an ''amulet of true strikes'' was more deadly in battle. When the ''amulet'' activated, the wearer's attacks struck truer and more powerfully, akin to being under the effect of a ''[[true strike]]'' spell. However, the ''amulet'' did not always activate reliably.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Saarvin]], a [[dragonborn]] ranger and [[adventurer]] possessed an ''amulet of true strikes'' while working with [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
